      • getEffectiveValueOf

        public static <T> T getEffectiveValueOf(T defaultValue,
                                        org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine,
                                        java.lang.String propertyKey)
        Gets the effective value of a property. The value can either be the default or command line.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - The default value.
        commandLine - The command line where the value is checked.
        propertyKey - The name of the property to get.
        Returns:
        Returns the effective value, either the default or the one from command line.

      • getEffectiveValueOf

        public static <T> T getEffectiveValueOf(T defaultValue,
                                        org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine,
                                        java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                        java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Gets the effective value of a property. The value can either be the default or command line.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - The default value.
        commandLine - The command line where the value is checked.
        propertyKey - The name of the property to get.
        type - The type of the value.
        Returns:
        Returns the effective value, either the default or the one from command line.
